TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MouseEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 提供 、 和 事件的資料。

span.span: Provides data for the , , and events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件發生於指標位於控制項上時，使用者按下滑鼠按鈕時。The event occurs when the user presses the mouse button while the pointer is over a control. 指標停留在控制項時，使用者放開滑鼠按鈕時，就會發生事件。The event occurs when the user releases the mouse button while the pointer remains over the control. 事件發生於使用者將滑鼠指標移至控制項上方。The event occurs when the user moves the mouse pointer over a control. A指定哪一個滑鼠按鈕按下時，按下並釋放滑鼠鍵的多少次滑鼠，以及滑鼠滾輪移動的量座標。A specifies which mouse button is pressed, how many times the mouse button was pressed and released, the coordinates of the mouse, and the amount the mouse wheel moved. 可接收沒有相對應的事件，如果使用者會將焦點切換到另一個應用程式，再鬆開滑鼠按鈕。It is possible to receive a event without a corresponding , if the user switches focus to another application before releasing the mouse button. 這三個事件有存在， ，和類別。These three events exist for the , , and classes. 事件模型的相關資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For information about the event model, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例的控制代碼事件控制項，以便按一下滑鼠右鍵選取所有文字控制項中。The following code examples handles the event on a control so that clicking the right mouse button selects all the text in the control. 這個範例需要您有包含表單的控制項名為`textBox1`。This example requires that you have a form that contains a control that is named `textBox1`. [!code-csharp[MouseEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MouseEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/VB/Form1.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例使用`Location`追蹤的屬性按一下滑鼠左鍵，以回應使用者輸入繪製一系列直線線段。The following code example uses the `Location` property to track clicks of the left mouse button and to draw a series of straight line segments in response to user input. 此範例不會不重新繪製直線，如果您隱藏表單，然後再重新顯示。為了簡單起見，已省略此程式碼。The example does not redraw the lines if you hide the form and then redisplay it; this code has been omitted for simplicity. [!code-csharp[MouseEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/CS/Form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MouseEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/VB/Form1.vb#2)] 下列程式碼範例使用和屬性，以顯示目前位置中的滑鼠指標視窗。The following code example uses the and properties to display the current position of the mouse pointer in a window. [!code-csharp[MouseEventArgs#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[MouseEventArgs#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/VB/Form1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會處理事件控制項，以便按一下滑鼠右鍵選取所有文字控制項中。The following code example handles the event on a control so that clicking the right mouse button selects all the text in the control. 這個範例需要您有包含表單的控制項，名為`textBox1`。This example requires that you have a form that contains a control named `textBox1`. [!code-csharp[MouseEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MouseEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得按下並釋放滑鼠鍵的次數。

span.span: Gets the number of times the mouse button was pressed and released.

value.span: ，包含按下並釋放滑鼠按鍵的次數。

span.span: An that contains the number of times the mouse button was pressed and released.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然 Windows 介面會定義標準滑鼠事件做為單一按一下或按兩下，個別的應用程式可以解譯為單一事件大量的按鍵。Although the Windows interface defines standard mouse events as either single-clicks or double-clicks, individual applications can interpret a larger number of clicks as a single event. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表會幫助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案，例如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`Control1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#54](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#54)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#54](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#54)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Delta As Integer
public: property int Delta { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得滑鼠滾輪滾動時帶有正負號的刻度數乘以 WHEEL_DELTA 常數。

span.span: Gets a signed count of the number of detents the mouse wheel has rotated, multiplied by the WHEEL_DELTA constant.

summary.span: 一個刻度是一個滑鼠滾輪的刻痕。

span.span: A detent is one notch of the mouse wheel.

value.span: 滑鼠滾輪滾動時帶有正負號的刻度數乘以 WHEEL_DELTA 常數。

span.span: A signed count of the number of detents the mouse wheel has rotated, multiplied by the WHEEL_DELTA constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 滑鼠滾輪結合滾輪的滑鼠按鈕的功能。The mouse wheel combines the features of a wheel and a mouse button. 滾輪有離散、 平均的色塊。The wheel has discrete, evenly spaced notches. 當您旋轉滾輪時，發現每個刻度是傳送滾輪訊息。When you rotate the wheel, a wheel message is sent as each notch is encountered. 一個滾輪波陷，一個刻度，是由定義滾動，這是 120。One wheel notch, a detent, is defined by the windows constant WHEEL_DELTA, which is 120. 正值表示滾輪 （遠離使用者）; 已向前旋轉負數值表示滾輪 （朝向使用者） 已向後旋轉。A positive value indicates that the wheel was rotated forward (away from the user); a negative value indicates that the wheel was rotated backward (toward the user). 目前，值為 120 是一個刻度的標準。Currently, a value of 120 is the standard for one detent. 如果較高的解析度 mice 現已引進，WHEEL_DELTA 的定義可能會變小。If higher resolution mice are introduced, the definition of WHEEL_DELTA might become smaller. 大部分的應用程式應該檢查正數或負數值，而不是彙總的總計。Most applications should check for a positive or negative value rather than an aggregate total. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表會幫助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案，例如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`Control1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#54](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#54)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#54](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#54)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Location As Point
public: property System::Drawing::Point Location { System::Drawing::Point get(); };

summary.span: 取得滑鼠在產生滑鼠事件期間的位置。

span.span: Gets the location of the mouse during the generating mouse event.

value.span: ，包含 X 及 Y 滑鼠座標 (以像素為單位)，這是相對於表單左上角的位置。

span.span: A that contains the x- and y- mouse coordinates, in pixels, relative to the upper-left corner of the form.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用追蹤滑鼠左鍵的按一下和繪製的直線線段的一系列以回應使用者輸入的屬性。The following code example uses the property to track left mouse clicks and draw a series of straight line segments in response to user input. 此範例不會保存繪製的直線，如果您隱藏表單，然後再重新顯示;為了簡單起見省略了這段程式碼。The example does not persist the drawn lines if you hide the form and then redisplay it; this code was omitted for simplicity. [!code-csharp[MouseEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/CS/Form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MouseEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/VB/Form1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property X As Integer
public: property int X { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得滑鼠在產生滑鼠事件期間的 X 座標。

span.span: Gets the x-coordinate of the mouse during the generating mouse event.

value.span: 滑鼠的 X 座標 (單位為像素)。

span.span: The x-coordinate of the mouse, in pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 滑鼠座標會根據所引發的事件而有所不同。The mouse coordinates vary based on the event being raised. 例如，當事件處理、 滑鼠座標值是相對於控制項引發事件的座標。For example, when the event is handled, the mouse coordinate values are relative to the coordinates of the control that raised the event. 某些與拖放作業相關的事件有關聯的是相對於表單原點或螢幕原點的滑鼠座標值。Some events related to drag-and-drop operations have associated mouse-coordinate values that are relative to the form origin or the screen origin. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用和屬性，以顯示目前位置中的滑鼠指標視窗。The following code example uses the and properties to display the current position of the mouse pointer in a window. [!code-csharp[MouseEventArgs#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[MouseEventArgs#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/VB/Form1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Y As Integer
public: property int Y { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得滑鼠在產生滑鼠事件期間的 Y 座標。

span.span: Gets the y-coordinate of the mouse during the generating mouse event.

value.span: 滑鼠的 Y 座標 (單位為像素)。

span.span: The y-coordinate of the mouse, in pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 滑鼠座標會根據所引發的事件而有所不同。The mouse coordinates vary based on the event being raised. 例如，當事件處理、 滑鼠座標值是相對於控制項引發事件的座標。For example, when the event is handled, the mouse coordinate values are relative to the coordinates of the control that raised the event. 某些與拖放作業相關的事件有關聯的滑鼠座標值，是相對於表單原點或螢幕原點。Some events related to drag-and-drop operations have associated mouse coordinate values that are relative to the form origin or the screen origin. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用和屬性，以顯示目前位置中的滑鼠指標視窗。The following code example uses the and properties to display the current position of the mouse pointer in a window. 若要使用此程式碼，呼叫`TrackCoordinates`從表單的建構函式。To use this code, call `TrackCoordinates` from the form constructor. [!code-csharp[MouseEventArgs#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[MouseEventArgs#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/VB/Form1.vb#3)]
